item.title: [ltc] Sam, Loyal Attendant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Peasant

Partner with Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Frodo into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

At the beigining of combat on your turn, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

Acitvated abilities of Foods you control cost {1} less to activate.

item.title: [ltc] Radagast, Wizard of Wilds
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Avatar Wizard

Ward {1}

Beasts and Birds you control have ward {1}

Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, choose one —

• Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

• Create a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.

item.title: [ltc] Sol Ring
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

item.title: [ltr] Plains
item.description:
Basic Land — Plains

({T}: Add {W}.)

item.title: [ltr] Swamp
item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

item.title: [ltr] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [ltr] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [ltr] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [ltr] Samwise the Stouthearted
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Peasant

Flash

When Samwise the Stouthearted enters the battlefield, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. Then the Ring tempts you.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Gollum, Patient Plotter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Horror

When Gollum, Patient Plotter leaves the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.

{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Gollumn from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Frodo, Sauron's Bane
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Citizen

{W/B}{W/B}: If Frodo, Sauron's Bane is a Citizen, it becomes a Halfling Scout with base power and toughness 2/3 and lifelink.

{B}{B}{B}: If Frodo is a Scout, it becomes a Halfling Rogue with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game if the Ring has tempted you four or more times this game. Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Tom Bombadil
item.description:
Legendary Creature — God Bard

As long as there are four or more lore counters among Sagas you control, Tom Bombadil has hexproof and indestructible.

Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Saga card. Put that onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] The Shire
item.description:
Legendary Land

The Shire enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature.

{T}: Add {G}.

{1}{G}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Food token.

item.title: [ltr] Mount Doom
item.description:
Legendary Land

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {R}.

{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Mount Doom deals 1 damage to each opponent.

{5}{B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Mount Doom and a legendary artifact: Choose up to two creatures, then destroy the rest. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] The One Ring
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

Indestructible

When The One Ring enters the battlefield, if you cast it, you gain protection from everything until your next turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each burden counter on The One Ring.

{T}: Put a burden counter on The One Ring, then draw a card for each burden counter on The One Ring.

https://www.ign.com/articles/lord-of-the-rings-magic-the-gathering-cards-gandalf-one-ring-spoilers

item.title: [ltr] Aragorn and Arwen, Wed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Elf Noble

Vigilance

Whenever Aragorn and Arwen, Wed enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. You gain 1 life for each other creature you control.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Sauron, the Lidless Eye
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Avatar Horror

When Sauron, the Lidless Eye enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

{1}{B}{R}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Each opponent loses 2 life.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] The Shire
item.description:
Legendary Land

The Shire enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a legendary creature.

{T}: Add {G}.

{1}{G}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Food token.

item.title: [ltr] Gandalf the Grey
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Avatar Wizard

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell. choose one that hasn't been chosen:

• You may tap or untap target permanent.

• Gandalf the Grey deals 3 damage to each opponent.

• Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

• Put Gandalf on top of its owner's library.

https://www.ign.com/articles/lord-of-the-rings-magic-the-gathering-cards-gandalf-one-ring-spoilers

item.title: [ltr] Gandalf the Grey
item.description:

item.title: [sld] Phage the Untouchable
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Avatar Minion

When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.

Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

item.title: [sld] Sen Triplets
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Human Wizard

At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't cast spells or activate abilities and plays with their hand revealed. You may play lands and cast spells from that player's hand this turn.

item.title: [sld] Yisan, the Wanderer Bard
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue Bard

{2}{G}, {T}, Put a verse counter on Yisan, the Wanderer Bard: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to the number of verse counters on Yisan, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Alela, Artful Provocateur
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Faerie Warlock

Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.

Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying.

item.title: [pwcs] Giada, Font of Hope
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying, vigilance

Each other Angel you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it for each Angel you already control.

{T}: Add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast an Angel spell.

item.title: [pwcs] Elspeth Resplendent
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Elspeth

+1: Choose up to one target creature. Put a +1/+1 counter and a counter from among flying, first strike, lifelink, or vigilance on it.

−3: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield with a shield counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

−7: Create five 3/3 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

item.title: [yone] Ghalma the Shaper
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Artificer

Vigilance

Whenever Ghalma the Shaper attacks, conjure a card named Tempered Steel into your hand, then create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

item.title: [yone] Kemba's Outfitter
item.description:
Creature — Cat Artificer

When Kemba's Outfitter enters the battlefield, choose one—

• Choose an Equipment card in your hand. It perpetually gains equip {1}.

• Target Equipment you control perpetually gains equip {1}.

item.title: [yone] Nettling Host
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Toxic 2

Corrupted—Exile Nettling Host from your graveyard: Conjure a card named Nettlecyst into your hand. Activate only if an opponent has three or more poison counters.

item.title: [yone] Norn's Fetchling
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect

Toxic 1

Corrupted—When Norn's Fetchling enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Plains into your hand. If an opponent has thre eor more poison counters, you may seek a nonland card instead.

item.title: [yone] Quicksilver Servitor
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Cleric

Ward {2}

Whenever you cast a spell from among cards put into your hand this turn, proliferate.

item.title: [yone] Surgical Metamorph
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Shapeshifter

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you weren't the starting player.

You may have Surgical Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any permanent on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

item.title: [yone] Tezzeret's Reckoning
item.description:
Instant

Exile three random cards from your library face down and look at them. For as long as they remain exiled, you may play one of those cards.

item.title: [yone] Blightwing Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Imp

Flying

Toxic 1

{B}: Blightwing Whelp gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever Blightwing Whelp deals combat damage to a player, seek a card with mana value equal to the number of poison counters that player has.

item.title: [yone] March Toward Perfection
item.description:
Sorcery

You get a boon with "When you cast your next Phyrexian creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter and deathtouch counter on it."

Draft a card from March Toward Perfection's spellbook.

item.title: [yone] Sheoldred's Assimilator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Menace

Whenever Sheoldred's Assimilator enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a card is exiled this way, you may conjure a duplicate of that card into the top five cards of your library at random.

item.title: [yone] Hexgold Sledge
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin!

When Hexgold Sledge enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Goblin Gaveleer onto the battlefield.

Equipped creature gets +1/+0.

Equip {1}

item.title: [yone] Magmatic Scorchwing
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Magmatic Scorchwing enters the battlefield, if there are no nonbasic land cards in your library, Magmatic Scorchwing deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [yone] Rothga, Bonded Engulfer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Trample

When Rothga, Bonded Engulfer enters the battlefield, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +X/+X, where X is its power."

item.title: [yone] Phyresis Roach
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect

Toxic 1

Whenever Phyresis Roach deals combat damage to a player, Insects you control and insect cards in your graveyard, hand, and library perpetually gain toxic 1.
